docs.lead_paragraph: SALE OF THE ADRIATIC. The sale of the steamship Adriatic to the Galway Company was the theme of conversation yesterday in Wall-street, in which no little regret was expressed that the last steamer built by STEERS, and the one of which Americans had most reason to be proud, should have a passed into the hands of a foreign company, and that too at a ruinous ...

docs.snippet: It is said that the President elect was much depressed to-day by a sense of the responsibility devolving upon him, and by the irrepressible conflict now going on between opposing interests among his political friends.

headline.main: AFFAIRS OF THE NATION.; Highly Important News from Washington. MOVEMENTS OF THE PRESIDENT ELECT. Facts and Rumors in Reference to the Cabinet. Action on the Peace Conference Report in the Senate. EXCITING SCENE IN THE HOUSE.The Vote on Mr. Corwin's Joint Resolution Reconsidered.An Amendment to the Constitution Carriedby a Two-thirds Vote.Important Dispatches from Maj.Anderson. RETURNS OF THE NORTH CAROLINA ELECTION. MR. LINCOLN AND HIS MOVEMENTS. CABINET FACTS AND RUMORS. MR. CHASE GOING INTO THE CABINET. ONE OF MR. LINCOLN'S TRAVELING SUITE TO BE COURT-MARTIALED. DISPATCHES FROM MAJ. ANDERSON. MOVEMENTS OF THE PEACE COMMISSIONERS. RECOMMENDATIONS OF THE PEACE CONFERENCE NOT LIKELY TO PASS. D.D. FIELD AND THE PEACE CONFERENCE. THE NORTH CAROLINA ELECTION. DOINGS OF THE SENATE. SCENE IN THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES. BILLS BEFORE CONGRESS. HEAVY RISE IN UNITED STATES STOCKS. MOVEMENTS OF EX-SENATOR SLIDELL. CAPT. ARMSTRONG TO BE COURT-MARTIALED. RESIGNATIONS IN THE ARMY AND NAVY. THE SLOOP-OF-WAR LEVANT.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is said that the President elect was much depressed to-day by a sense of the responsibility devolving upon him, and by the irrepressible conflict now going on between opposing interests among his political friends.
